entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming east 30 before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning then west 20 late in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
